Courses.Title: Microsoft Azure Fundamentals
Courses.Description: Demonstrate foundational knowledge of cloud concepts, core Azure services, plus Azure management and governance features and tools.

Courses.Title: Microsoft Azure AI Fundamentals
Courses.Description: Demonstrate foundational knowledge of AI and machine learning concepts and related Microsoft Azure services.

Courses.Title: Microsoft Security, Compliance, and Identity Fundamentals
Courses.Description: Demonstrate foundational knowledge of security, compliance, and identity concepts and related Microsoft solutions.

Courses.Title: Microsoft Identity and Access Administrator
Courses.Description: Implement and manage identity and access using Microsoft Entra ID, including authentication, Conditional Access, identity governance, and application access.

Courses.Title: Microsoft Information Protection Administrator
Courses.Description: Plan and implement information protection and data loss prevention with Microsoft Purview, including sensitivity labels, DLP, retention, and eDiscovery/audit capabilities.

Courses.Title: Microsoft Azure Administrator
Courses.Description: Implement, manage, and monitor Azure environments including identity, governance, storage, compute, virtual networking, and backup/recovery.

Courses.Title: Microsoft Azure Solutions Architect Expert
Courses.Description: Design Azure infrastructure solutions including identity, governance, security, data storage, business continuity, and application architecture to meet business requirements.

Courses.Title: Designing and Implementing a Microsoft Azure AI Solution
Courses.Description: Build, manage, and deploy AI solutions on Azure, including vision, language, speech, conversational AI, and generative AI using Azure AI services.

Courses.Title: Microsoft Azure Data Scientist Associate
Courses.Description: Apply data science and machine learning to implement and run ML workloads on Azure, including training, evaluation, deployment, and MLOps using Azure Machine Learning.

Courses.Title: Designing and Implementing Microsoft DevOps Solutions
Courses.Description: Implement DevOps practices including source control, CI/CD, infrastructure as code, dependency management, security, compliance, monitoring, and continuous feedback using Azure DevOps and GitHub.

Courses.Title: Auth0 Identity and Access Management
Courses.Description: Implement identity and access management solutions using Auth0, including authentication, authorization, and user management.

Courses.Title: Kubernetes Administrator
Courses.Description: Manage and administer Kubernetes clusters, including deployment, scaling, and troubleshooting of containerized applications.
